October 1-5, 2007

NFPA Professional Development Seminar Week, Baltimore, MD

Call +1 800 344-3555 or
+1 508 895-8300.

Get top-quality instruction from the foremost industry experts on topics including the National Electrical Code, life safety, fire alarm systems, sprinkler systems and more.

Read more

October 7-13, 2007

Fire Prevention Week 2007

Practice your escape plan. It's not enough just to have a fire escape plan. To escape safely from a home fire make sure that everyone in the home has practiced the plan.

Protect your family by educating yourself on fire safety. Learn how to help yourself and loved ones escape in the event of a home fire.

Next event this week

Read more

October 7-13, 2007

The Great American Fire Drill

Sound the alarm. It’s time for the Great American Fire Drill. During Fire Prevention Week 2007, NFPA is asking kids and families all across the United States to practice their home fire escape plans.

With your help, we’re hoping to have the world’s biggest fire drill.

Previous even this week

Next event this week

October 22-24, 2007

Applying NFPA 101®, Life Safety Code®, to the Joint Commission Statement of Conditions, Secaucus, NJ

Joint Commission accreditation is essential to your organization’s reputation for safety. Attend this three-day seminar on the Management of the Environment of Care chapter for hospitals and Statement of Conditions compliance based on the Life Safety Code®.
